trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were no other sightings in Fort Collins on or around May 17th 1973
Summary: See in Ft Collins at night later reported seen in Boulder same night
divs: sighting detailsi was in the backyard of my house wagon wheel dr ft. collins, co between 8-9 pm. it was dark except for the city glow. i was facing north and lookup to the ne to see an elongated disk shaped object with pulsating colored lights around the object; reds greens and yellows. it was solid against the city din. there was absolutely no associated noise and i would estimate the elevation at 1500 or less feet. it was not a usual aircraft. it was moving slowly in a south-westernly direction. i watched it for maybe 15-20 secs in absolute amassment. i rushed into the house and told my wife there was a ufo above the backyard and rushed around to get my camera. it seemed forever to locate the camera and when i went outside to take a picture it was gone. the next night on channel 7 (i think) news the denver tv station reported a ufo (maybe several ufo sightings) sighting in boulder. (you can check the exact date by the tv report\maybe denver\boulder paper too i do not know). the"ufo" was moving as i watched it in a direction directly towards boulder, co. i was a student at csu for 8 years. i never reported this but the tv station report the next evening from denver confirmed for me what i had seen in the ft. collins airspace. my times and dates are very approximate. i was moved to report this from the nbc dateline ufo program last night. one of the segments was similar to what i am reporting that happened nearly 35 years ago.
